name: Gun and Fun: Dating Sim Visual Novel
name_original: Gun and Fun: Dating Sim Visual Novel
description:
A game about dating a virtual girl while playing a bullet hell game.

WARNING:
I made this in 2 days, college is taking all the time I needed. It is a demo and it is far from what I wanted to make. The audio was created in only 5 minutes (don't expect much lol) but the graphic was made in 1 day, and the other was programming the game (which was more complicated than I expected)

Gameplay:
Fight the enemy while trying to gain the trust of a virtual girl in the game! Gain the trust and fight the final boss without dying to win the demo!

The game is being developed into more story driven, but since I'm submitting it to a bullet hell game, I decided to focus into the bullet hell genre, but in the next development, I will focus on the story part...

You can also help me to focus more on game dev, and I will credit you in my game description and game credits, link is https://ko-fi.com/kuritzu
